root.name: Laser Invasion
root.description: IntroductionLaser invasion is a first person helicopter shooter for the NES. StorySpider and undercover agent has been captured by the enemy. It is believed that Spider has information on the enemy's newest weapons. Your mission is to infiltrate the prison camp in which Spider is held captive and rescue him. However you should be careful because the enemy has a new attack helicopter named "Overhead Hovers".
